trends: There has been one other sighting in Island Lake
There were no other sightings in Island Lake on or around July 2nd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWe are sitting in yard enjoying the night and fireworks when five bright red glowing lights in triangle format flying in sky above us. We were like what is that? Is that a fire work? Or those Mexican larterns ? But no. They traveled together like planes. Then just disappeared. Tried to video tape on phone only took 20 secs of recording. But have tirangle shown. Very weird.
Summary: Sitting in yard saw five bright lights in sky. NOT FIREWORKS. traveling together high in sky in triangle formation. Then just disappeared.
